title: Jared Huffman
deleted: The following is a partial list of legislation introduced by Huffman.

*[[California Coastal National Monument Expansion Act of 2013]] â€“ a bill that "would expand the boundary of the California Coastal National Monument to include 1,255 acres of federal land known as the Point Arena-Stornetta public lands; the new land is currently managed by the [[Bureau of Land Management]] (BLM) and the bill would require the BLM to manage that land as part of the [[National Landscape Conservation System]]."<ref name="cbo1411">{{cite web|url=http://www.cbo.gov/publication/44373|title=CBO - H.R. 1411|publisher=Congressional Budget Office|access-date=July 22, 2013}}</ref> The bill was Huffman's first to pass.<ref name="dailykos1">{{cite news|url=http://www.dailykos.com/story/2013/07/22/1225762/-CA-Freshman-Congressman-gets-very-First-House-Bill-passed-by-113th#|title=CA Freshman Congressman gets First House Bill passed by 113th!.. protecting environment yet.|last=LOrion|date=July 22, 2013|newspaper=Daily Kos|access-date=July 23, 2013}}</ref><ref name="PRhuffman1">{{cite web|url=http://huffman.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/house-of-representatives-passes-congressman-huffman-s-first-bill|title=House of Representatives Passes Congressman Huffman's First Bill|publisher=Representative Huffman's Office|access-date=July 23, 2013}}</ref>
